amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease funding made available in Division E, other than amounts made available to the Department of Defense, by 14 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 251 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to decrease funding made available in Division E, other than amounts made available to the Department of Defense, by 14 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Banks amendment (A088) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 287 (Roll no. 405).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Banks amendment (A088) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 287 (Roll no. 405).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A088) offered by Mr. Banks.
